text: Gandheevam is a 1994 Indian Malayalam film, directed by RK Umabalan, starring Siddique and Napoleon in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Siddique as Vijay Menon * Sukumari as Vijay's mother * Jagathy Sreekumar as Pothuval * Santhosh * Rajan P Dev as Karunakaran Nair * Prathapachandran as TAPA officer * Viajayan as Minister * Master Manikandan as Bijumon * Napoleon as Wins *T.S.Krishnan as Krishnan *Seetha as Seetha *Rajasekharan *Pavithran ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films
title: Gandheevam
